content.question: Which of the following pieces of evidence does the author use to support his implicit argument that Maya society underwent a dramatic cultural change in the sixteenth century?

choices.label: Dominican friars knew the Maya language.
The Maya were converted to Christianity.
The Maya nobility lost its social status.
Maya people before the conquest were illiterate.

content.answer: The Maya were converted to Christianity.

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Identify the evidence used in a source to support an argument.
